content.new: I want to make sure everything is kosher with how I'm getting the multisense lidar to work.  The issue is that both the `robot_state_publisher` (subscribed to `/ihmc_ros/valkyrie/output/joint_states`) and `multisense_state_publisher` are both publishing
content.old: I want to make sure everything is kosher with how I'm getting the multisense lidar to work.  The issue is that both the `robot_state_publisher` (subscribed to `/ihmc_ros/valkyrie/output/joint_states`) and `multisense_state_publisher` are both publishing

issue.title: multisense_state_publisher and robot_state_publisher publish conflicting TF for MS lidar
